technology:
# üöÄ ROMANIAN DATING APP - PRODUCT REQUIREMENTS DOCUMENT

## 1. PRODUCT VISION

**Problem Statement:** 
Romanian singles struggle to find meaningful connections through generic international dating platforms that don't understand local culture, language nuances, and relationship expectations.

**Vision Statement:**
"To create Romania's premier dating platform that celebrates local culture while leveraging cutting-edge AI to facilitate authentic, lasting relationships between Romanian singles."

**Value Proposition:**
- Cultural authenticity with Romanian-specific features
- AI-powered matching based on local preferences
- Secure, scalable platform built for Romanian market

---

## 2. USER PERSONAS

### üë§ **Primary Persona: "Mihai - Urban Professional"**
- **Age:** 28-35
- **Location:** Bucure»ôti, Cluj, Timi»ôoara
- **Occupation:** IT, Finance, Marketing
- **Goals:** Serious relationship, marriage-minded
- **Pain Points:** Limited time, wants quality matches
- **Tech Savvy:** High, expects modern UX

### üë§ **Secondary Persona: "Ana - Creative Millennial"**
- **Age:** 24-32
- **Location:** Urban/Semi-urban Romania
- **Occupation:** Design, Media, Education
- **Goals:** Authentic connections, shared interests
- **Pain Points:** Superficial matches, cultural misunderstanding
- **Tech Savvy:** Medium-High

### üë§ **Tertiary Persona: "Radu - Returning Expat"**
- **Age:** 30-40
- **Location:** Recently returned to Romania
- **Occupation:** Various, international experience
- **Goals:** Reconnect with Romanian culture, find partner
- **Pain Points:** Cultural re-adaptation, trust issues
- **Tech Savvy:** High

---

## 3. FEATURE BREAKDOWN

### üéØ **CORE FEATURES (MVP)**
1. **User Registration & Profile Creation**
2. **AI-Powered Matching Algorithm**
3. **Chat/Messaging System**
4. **Profile Discovery & Swiping**
5. **Basic Search & Filters**
6. **Photo Upload & Verification**
7. **Push Notifications**
8. **Basic Admin Panel**

### ‚≠ê **ENHANCED FEATURES (Phase 2)**
1. **Video Chat Integration**
2. **Advanced AI Personality Matching**
3. **Romanian Culture Quiz Integration**
4. **Location-based Events**
5. **Premium Subscription Features**
6. **Social Media Integration**

### üöÄ **FUTURE FEATURES (Phase 3)**
1. **AR/VR Dating Experiences**
2. **Blockchain Identity Verification**
3. **AI Dating Coach**
4. **Group Dating Features**
5. **International Romanian Diaspora Matching**

---

## 4. USER STORIES

### **AUTHENTICATION & PROFILE**
```
Epic: User Onboarding
```

**US-001:** As a new user, I want to register with email/phone so that I can create my dating profile.
**US-002:** As a user, I want to complete a cultural compatibility quiz so that I get better matches.
**US-003:** As a user, I want to upload and verify my photos so that others trust my profile.
**US-004:** As a user, I want to set my dating preferences so that I see relevant matches.

### **MATCHING & DISCOVERY**
```
Epic: AI-Powered Matching
```

**US-005:** As a user, I want to see AI-curated matches so that I find compatible partners.
**US-006:** As a user, I want to swipe through profiles so that I can quickly indicate interest.
**US-007:** As a user, I want to search with filters so that I can find specific types of people.
**US-008:** As a user, I want to see match compatibility scores so that I understand why we matched.

### **COMMUNICATION**
```
Epic: User Interaction
```

**US-009:** As a matched user, I want to chat in real-time so that I can get to know my match.
**US-010:** As a user, I want to send photos/voice messages so that I can communicate more expressively.
**US-011:** As a user, I want video chat capability so that I can have face-to-face conversations.
**US-012:** As a user, I want conversation starters so that I can break the ice easily.

### **SAFETY & MODERATION**
```
Epic: Platform Safety
```

**US-013:** As a user, I want to report inappropriate behavior so that the platform stays safe.
**US-014:** As a user, I want to block users so that I can avoid unwanted contact.
**US-015:** As an admin, I want to moderate content so that I can maintain platform quality.

---

## 5. ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA

### **US-001: User Registration**
**Given** a new user visits the app
**When** they provide valid email and password
**Then** they receive verification email
**And** can access profile creation flow
**And** account is created in MongoDB with encrypted data

### **US-005: AI Matching**
**Given** a user has completed their profile
**When** they access the discovery section
**Then** they see 10+ AI-curated matches
**And** matches are based on compatibility algorithm
**And** matches refresh daily with new suggestions
**And** compatibility score is displayed (60-99%)

### **US-009: Real-time Chat**
**Given** two users have matched
**When** one user sends a message
**Then** the other user receives it instantly
**And** message is stored in MongoDB
**And** both users see delivery/read status
**And** chat history is preserved

---

## 6. NON-FUNCTIONAL REQUIREMENTS

### **PERFORMANCE**
- **Response Time:** < 2 seconds for all API calls
- **Load Time:** App launch < 3 seconds
- **Concurrent Users:** Support 10,000+ simultaneous users
- **Database Queries:** < 100ms average response time
- **Image Upload:** < 5 seconds for photos up to 5MB

### **SECURITY**
- **Data Encryption:** AES-256 for sensitive data
- **Authentication:** JWT tokens with refresh mechanism
- **API Security:** Rate limiting, input validation
- **Photo Verification:** AI-powered fake photo detection
- **Privacy:** GDPR compliance, data anonymization

### **SCALABILITY**
- **Horizontal Scaling:** MongoDB sharding support
- **Auto-scaling:** Cloud infrastructure adaptation
- **CDN Integration:** Global content delivery
- **Microservices:** Modular architecture for scaling
- **Caching:** Redis for session and frequently accessed data

### **AVAILABILITY**
- **Uptime:** 99.9% availability SLA
- **Disaster Recovery:** Automated backups every 6 hours
- **Monitoring:** Real-time performance monitoring
- **Failover:** Automatic failover mechanisms

---

## 7. TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS

### **BACKEND ARCHITECTURE**
```typescript
// Core Technology Stack
- Runtime: Node.js 18+ with TypeScript
- Framework: Express.js with async/await patterns
- Database: MongoDB 6.0+ with Mongoose ODM
- Authentication: JWT + refresh tokens
- Real-time: Socket.io for chat
- File Storage: AWS S3 or Cloudinary
- Caching: Redis for sessions
```

### **DATABASE SCHEMA (MongoDB)**
```javascript
// User Collection
{
  _id: ObjectId,
  email: String (unique, encrypted),
  password: String (bcrypt hashed),
  profile: {
    name: String,
    age: Number,
    location: GeoJSON,
    photos: [String], // URLs
    bio: String,
    interests: [String],
    culturalPreferences: Object
  },
  preferences: {
    ageRange: [Number, Number],
    maxDistance: Number,
    interests: [String]
  },
  aiProfile: {
    personalityVector: [Number], // AI-generated
    compatibilityScores: Map,
    lastAnalyzed: Date
  },
  createdAt: Date,
  lastActive: Date
}

// Match Collection
{
  _id: ObjectId,
  users: [ObjectId], // Array of 2 user IDs
  compatibilityScore: Number,
  status: String, // 'pending', 'mutual', 'expired'
  createdAt: Date,
  aiInsights: Object
}

// Message Collection
{
  _id: ObjectId,
  matchId: ObjectId,
  senderId: ObjectId,
  content: String,
  type: String, // 'text', 'image', 'voice'
  timestamp: Date,
  readAt: Date
}
```

### **AI INTEGRATION REQUIREMENTS**
```python
# AI Services Integration
- Matching Algorithm: TensorFlow/PyTorch model
- Image Recognition: Computer Vision API
- Natural Language Processing: Romanian language model
- Personality Analysis: Custom ML pipeline
- Recommendation Engine: Collaborative filtering
```

### **API ENDPOINTS**
```typescript
// Authentication
POST /api/auth/register
POST /api/auth/login
POST /api/auth/refresh
POST /api/auth/logout

// Profile Management
GET /api/profile/me
PUT /api/profile/update
POST /api/profile/photos
DELETE /api/profile/photos/:id

// Matching & Discovery
GET /api/matches/suggestions
POST /api/matches/swipe
GET /api/matches/mutual
GET /api/discovery/search

// Messaging
GET /api/messages/:matchId
POST /api/messages/send
PUT /api/messages/:id/read
```

### **MOBILE REQUIREMENTS**
- **iOS:** Swift 5.0+, iOS 14+ support
- **Android:** Kotlin, API level 24+ (Android 7.0)
- **Cross-platform:** React Native or Flutter consideration
- **Push Notifications:** Firebase Cloud Messaging
- **Offline Support:** Core features available offline

---

## 8. SUCCESS METRICS & KPIs

### **USER ACQUISITION**
- **Target:** 50,000 registered users in first 6 months
- **CAC (Customer Acquisition Cost):** < $15 per user
- **Organic Growth Rate:** 25% month-over-month
- **App Store Rating:** 4.5+ stars

### **ENGAGEMENT METRICS**
- **DAU/MAU Ratio:** > 30%
- **Session Duration:** Average 15+ minutes
- **Messages per Match:** 10+ messages average
- **Profile Completion Rate:** 85%+

### **MATCHING SUCCESS**
- **Match Rate:** 15-20% swipe-to-match conversion
- **Conversation Rate:** 60% of matches start chatting
- **Response Rate:** 70% message response rate
- **Meeting Rate:** 25% of conversations lead to dates

### **BUSINESS METRICS**
- **Revenue per User:** $25 annual average
- **Premium Conversion:** 15% of active users
- **Churn Rate:** < 5% monthly
- **Lifetime Value:** $150 per user

### **TECHNICAL METRICS**
- **API Response Time:** < 200ms average
- **App Crash Rate:** < 0.1%
- **Database Query Performance:** < 50ms
- **Uptime:** 99.95%

---

## 9. RISK ASSESSMENT

### **HIGH RISK** üî¥
**Risk:** AI matching algorithm accuracy
**Impact:** Poor user experience, low engagement
**Mitigation:** Extensive A/B testing, gradual rollout, user feedback integration

**Risk:** Data privacy breach
**Impact:** Legal issues, user trust loss
**Mitigation:** Security audits, encryption, GDPR compliance, regular penetration testing

### **MEDIUM RISK** üü°
**Risk:** Scalability issues during growth
**Impact:** Performance degradation, user churn
**Mitigation:** Load testing, auto-scaling infrastructure, performance monitoring

**Risk:** Competition from established players
**Impact:** Market share loss, user acquisition challenges
**Mitigation:** Unique Romanian-focused features, superior UX, local partnerships

### **LOW RISK** üü¢
**Risk:** Third-party service dependencies
**Impact:** Feature limitations, cost increases
**Mitigation:** Multiple vendor options, fallback mechanisms, contract negotiations

---

## 10. MVP SCOPE - PHASE 1 DEPLOYMENT

### **MUST HAVE (MVP Core)**
‚úÖ User registration and authentication
‚úÖ Basic profile creation with photos
‚úÖ Simple matching algorithm (location + age)
‚úÖ Chat messaging system
‚úÖ Basic admin panel for moderation
‚úÖ MongoDB database with core collections
‚úÖ REST API with essential endpoints
‚úÖ Basic mobile app (iOS/Android)

### **SHOULD HAVE (MVP Enhanced)**
‚úÖ AI-powered matching algorithm
‚úÖ Photo verification system
‚úÖ Push notifications
‚úÖ Advanced search filters
‚úÖ Real-time chat with Socket.io
‚úÖ Basic analytics dashboard

### **COULD HAVE (Post-MVP)**
‚è≥ Video chat integration
‚è≥ Premium subscription features
‚è≥ Social media integration
‚è≥ Advanced AI personality matching

### **WON'T HAVE (Future Phases)**
‚ùå AR/VR features
‚ùå Blockchain verification
‚ùå International expansion
‚ùå Group dating features

---

## üìã DEPLOYMENT CHECKLIST

### **PRE-DEPLOYMENT**
- [ ] MongoDB Atlas cluster configured
- [ ] All database indexes created
- [ ] API endpoints tested and documented
- [ ] Security audit completed
- [ ] Performance testing passed
- [ ] GDPR compliance verified

### **DEPLOYMENT**
- [ ] Production environment setup
- [ ] CI/CD pipeline configured
- [ ] Monitoring and logging active
- [ ] Backup systems operational
- [ ] SSL certificates installed

### **POST-DEPLOYMENT**
- [ ] User acceptance testing
- [ ] Performance monitoring active
- [ ] Customer support ready
- [ ] Marketing campaigns launched
- [ ] Analytics tracking enabled

---

**Ready for development team handoff! üöÄ**

*This PRD provides complete technical and business requirements for the Romanian Dating App with MongoDB integration and AI team collaboration.*

‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ CompatibilityScore.module.scss
